greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 1 if k-th arithmetic derivative of A276086(n) is zero for some k, otherwise 0.
comment: a(n) = 1 if A276086(n) is in A099308, 0 otherwise.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65537
program: A003415checked(n) = if(n<=1, 0, my(f=factor(n), s=0); for(i=1, #f~, if(f[i,2]>=f[i,1],return(0), s += f[i, 2]/f[i, 1])); (n*s));
A276086(n) = { my(i=0,m=1,pr=1,nextpr); while((n>0),i=i+1; nextpr = prime(i)*pr; if((n%nextpr),m*=(prime(i)^((n%nextpr)/pr));n-=(n%nextpr));pr=nextpr); m; };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 12 2019
